projects.title: Degosh
projects.brief: It is a bot for buying limited sneakers & NFTs
description: This application helps people to buy collectible staff. It is a bot for buying limited sneakers & NFTs. Degosh used to support a lot of retailers such as supreme, Adidas/Yeezy, Kith and Shopify. Application much increased chances to let users buy whatever they want on special releases
We got a lot of positive feedback from users who successfully bought limited items using this bot (you can see users' reports on our discord on the #success channel).

I built an authentication system for this bot using Node JS and Express JS and MongoDB - a simple and secure system, applied to auth system discord bot and web application (the bot). It was hosted on Ubuntu Server, mostly using JavaScript
The project has been sold to Quasar.

projects.title: Linear algebra library
projects.brief: A collection of Vector and Matrix classes
description: It is a library written in TypeScript that includes two classes: Vector and Matrix and some methods inside them to do calculations. Also, a bunch of Mocha/Chai tests is available. This package has been published into npm.

projects.title: Shelter+ Extension
projects.brief: It used to buy NFTs and limited sneakers
description: It is an extension for Google Chrome browser used to automatically purchase limited sneakers and NFTs.
Shelter+ is a private discord community of people interested in collecting or reselling limited stuff. This program is available only for members of this community.

projects.title: Web scrapers
projects.brief: Checking availiablility of products on retailers' sites
description: I built some web scrapers used to notify members of the Quasar private discord community when XBOXes and PS5s (and other short-supply goods) are available. Users successfully buy whatever they want with this custom notification system on every restock.
Most of them are written in Python using the request library.

projects.title: Sorting visualization
description: I build a web-based application to animate some sorting algorithms.
It works on the following sorting algorithms: Bubble sort, Quick sort, Selection sort and Merge sort.
